entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
